FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE IRREGULARITIES OF SETTING WATER RATES BY THE METROPOLITAN WATERWORKS AND SEWERAGE SYSTEM (MWSS)-REGULATORY OFFICE AND CONCESSIONAIRES MANILA WATER AND MAYNILAD, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO PASS-ON CHARGES OF CORPORATE INCOME TAX, OPERATING EXPENSES, ADVANCED COLLECTION FOR FUTURE PROJECTS AND REDUNDANT COLLECTION OF FOREIGN EXCHANGE RECOVERY ADJUSTMENTS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.
DATE FILED : 2017-04-19
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-05-17
          -TWG created for bills proposing to create a central body for the water sector, to be chaired by Rep. Herrera-Dy
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-02-07
          -1st TWG meeting, secretariat instructed to request Com on Rules to jointly refer water bills to the Coms on Public Works and Highways and Govt Reorg (lead)
      3. Recommendations submitted by the TWG on 2018-03-07
          -Letter to Com on Rules for water bills to be jointly referred to the Coms on Govt Reorg (lead) and Govt Enterprises and Public Works and Highways (secondary)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2017-05-09
